# 1 Minute Academy
# This file helps LLM tools discover high-level entry points.

Site: http://localhost:5173
Sitemap: http://localhost:5173/sitemap.xml

Primary pages:
- http://localhost:5173/
- http://localhost:5173/topics
- http://localhost:5173/pricing
- http://localhost:5173/faq

Topics (published):
- Blocks vs transactions: http://localhost:5173/topic/blocks-vs-transactions — How individual transactions get bundled into blocks — in 1 minute.
- Difficulty adjustment: http://localhost:5173/topic/mining-difficulty-adjustment — Why mining gets harder (or easier) to keep block times stable — in 1 minute.
